pkgmetadata.longdescription: An R Port of the 'ImageJ' Plugin 'Auto Threshold' // Algorithms for automatically finding appropriate thresholds for numerical data, with special functions for thresholding images. Provides the 'ImageJ' 'Auto Threshold' plugin functionality to R users. See https://imagej.net/plugins/auto-threshold and Landini et al. (2017) DOI:10.1111/jmi.12474.
